T

TCPClient - Class in com.umbranium
TCPClient is the clientside wrapper that can receive and send strings.
TCPClient(String, int) - Constructor for class com.umbranium.TCPClient
Creates the client instance, needs to connect to a specified server.
TCPServer - Class in com.umbranium
TCPServer is a multithreaded ServerSocket wrapper that can respond to requests from multiple clients at once, using a predetermined callback.
TCPServer(int, Function<String, String>) - Constructor for class com.umbranium.TCPServer
Creates a server instance, one which will reply to all incoming requests putting them through the given callback function
